title: Oasis!
description:
Furnace Creek Inn - Death Valley National Park USA.
	Recently renamed to: "The Inn at Death Valley"
	
	20 Mar 2016
author: Gordon Cottrell
generated_description: The historic Furnace Creek Inn (now The Inn at Death Valley) serves as an oasis in the harsh landscape of Death Valley National Park. This architectural landmark provides a striking contrast to the surrounding desert environment. The inn represents human resilience and hospitality in one of the most extreme climates in North America.
